/CareTeam.summary: Manager for resources of type CareTeam
/CareTeam.description: The Manager for resources of type CareTeam: provides services to manage the collection of all the CareTeam instances

get.summary: Search all resources of type CareTeam based on a set of criteria

parameters.name: _content
parameters.description: Search the contents of the resource's data using a fulltext search

parameters.name: _has
parameters.description: Return resources linked to by the given target

parameters.name: _id
parameters.description: The ID of the resource

parameters.name: _language
parameters.description: The language of the resource

parameters.name: _lastUpdated
parameters.description: Only return resources which were last updated as specified by the given range

parameters.name: _profile
parameters.description: Search for resources which have the given profile

parameters.name: _security
parameters.description: Search for resources which have the given security labels

parameters.name: _tag
parameters.description: Search for resources which have the given tag

parameters.name: _text
parameters.description: Search the contents of the resource's narrative using a fulltext search

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: Type of team

parameters.name: context
parameters.description: Encounter or episode associated with CareTeam

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: Time period team covers

parameters.name: encounter
parameters.description: Encounter or episode associated with CareTeam

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: External Ids for this team

parameters.name: managingOrganization
parameters.description: Managing organization of a care team

parameters.name: participant
parameters.description: Who is involved

parameters.name: patient
parameters.description: Who care team is for

parameters.name: reasonCode
parameters.description: Reason care team exists

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: proposed | active | suspended | inactive | entered-in-error

parameters.name: subject
parameters.description: Who care team is for

requestBody.description: The new state of the resource

200.description: the resource being returned after being updated

ETag.description: Version from Resource.meta.version as a weak ETag

parameters.name: active
parameters.description: A server defined search that may match any of the string fields in the Address, including line, city, state, country, postalCode, and/or text

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: A (part of the) address of the organization

parameters.name: address-city
parameters.description: A city specified in an address

parameters.name: address-country
parameters.description: A country specified in an address

parameters.name: address-postalcode
parameters.description: A postal code specified in an address

parameters.description: A state specified in an address

parameters.name: address-use
parameters.description: A use code specified in an address

parameters.name: contactName
parameters.description: Contact name

parameters.name: cvrNumber
parameters.description: Cvr number of the organization

parameters.name: endpoint
parameters.description: Technical endpoints providing access to services operated for the organization

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: Any identifier for the organization (not the accreditation issuer's identifier)

parameters.name: municipalityCode
parameters.description: Municipality code of the organization

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: A portion of the organization's name or alias

parameters.name: partof
parameters.description: An organization of which this organization forms a part

parameters.name: phonetic
parameters.description: A portion of the organization's name using some kind of phonetic matching algorithm

parameters.name: providerIdentifier
parameters.description: Provider identifier of the organization

parameters.name: regionCode
parameters.description: Region code of the organization

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: Source of the organization

parameters.name: specialty
parameters.description: Specialty of the organization

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: A code for the type of organization

200.description: the resource being returned after being updated

/_history.summary: Read a past version of resource instance of all types
/_history.description: Access a previous versions of all types

get.summary: Read the past states of all resources

parameters.name: _since
parameters.description: Only include resource versions that were created at or after the given instant in time

parameters.name: _at
parameters.description: Only include resource versions that were current at some point during the time period specified in the date time value (see Search notes on date searching)

parameters.name: _list
parameters.description: Only include resource versions that are referenced in the specified list (current list references are allowed)

summary.name: _summary
summary.description: Requests the server to return a designated subset of the resource

format.name: _format
format.description: Specify alternative response formats by their MIME-types (when a client is unable acccess accept: header)

pretty.name: _pretty
pretty.description: Ask for a pretty printed response for human convenience

elements.name: _elements
elements.description: Requests the server to return a collection of elements from the resource

count.name: _count
count.description: The maximum number of search results on a page. The server is not bound to return the number requested, but cannot return more
